title: Leave buster system is bullshit
body:
So my internet has been dropping out lately, and i get punished by leave buster cause my internet is playing up. your leave buster system is a crock of shit. so now i gotta wait 20-30 mins to play a game cause my internet decides to play up.

Fuck you riot

replies.body:
If your internet is acting up, you need to fix it or not play until it's ok. You aren't ruining games for the other players any less because it's your internet doing it, and you're still responsible for queueing up knowing there's something wrong.

Instead of thinking about yourself, think about what your teammates have to deal with when you leave, and how you feel when other people leave your matches and cause you to lose.

For more information on Leaver Buster, go here; https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ
